definitions.text:
1. man guilty of adultery; man who has sexual commerce with any married woman, except his wife. [See Adultery.]
2. In scripture, an idolator. Ezekiel 23:37.
3. An apostate from the true faith, or one who violates his covenant engagements; very wicked person. Jeremiah 9:2 and 23.
4. One devoted to earthly things. James 4:4.
